snippet: The attorney general in Washington State says that the Grocery Manufacturers Association illegally collected and spent more than $7 million while shielding the identity of its contributors.
abstract: Washington State Atty Gen Bob Ferguson files suit saying Grocery Manufacturers Association violated campaign finance laws in attempt to block measure that would require labeling of genetically modified foods; suit contends group illegally collected and spent more than $7 million while shielding the identity of its contributors.
lead_paragraph: The attorney general in Washington State says that the Grocery Manufacturers Association illegally collected and spent more than $7 million while shielding the identity of its contributors.

headline.main: Grocers’ Lobby Faces Lawsuit Over Donors
headline.print_headline: Grocers’ Lobby Faces Lawsuit Over Donors
